column2: Source: City of Toronto open data portal. Budgets are a hybrid of operating and capital amounts. The general quality and availability of this data source is poor. Caution: The 2016 dataset does not include Activities. The 2013 dataset is staff recommended. The data contain anomalies. Inter-divisional charges (2%-3%) are double counted. Roughly estimated re-allocations for continuity have been applied to the earlier years.
